title: Meet The Real-Life 'Spider Woman' Who Scaled A 15-Metre Wall In Less Than 7 Seconds
text:
Meet The Real-Life 'Spider Woman' Who Scaled A 15-Metre Wall In Less Than 7 Seconds

Meet The Real-Life 'Spider Woman' Who Scaled A 15-Metre Wall In Less Than 7 Seconds

An Indonesian climber, Aries Susanti Rahayu, broke all records and became the fastest to climb a wall. And just guess her record time? She scaled the 15-metre wall in less than seven seconds - a record time of 6.995 seconds.

The video of the incident is now going viral on social media which shows Aries wearing a red jersey and a hijab and climbing the wall. Competing in the women’s speed category of the IFSC Climbing World Cup in Xiamen, China, the star athlete scaled the wall so quickly that people on social media called her ‘Spider woman’.

Rahayu broke all the records and became ‘the first woman to clock in a time under 7 seconds!!’ According to reports, she scaled the wall with an injured finger and still broke all the records.

Watch the video here:

Women's speed climbing record was smashed. Under 7 seconds. Inhuman. pic.twitter.com/8EC1A1wE1O — Mark Serrels (@Serrels) October 20, 2019

The video garnered more than 4.9 million views, 226.9k likes with many lauding her for the feat.

1.

Some gyms have the speed route set-up. I dare you to try it. It's actually hard to get up the route period, let alone under 7 seconds. — Mark Serrels (@Serrels) October 20, 2019

Don't Miss 473 SHARES 2.5 K SHARES 450 SHARES

2.

Imagine talking crap to her from your 7th story apartment bedroom window and she just straight up scales your building to come get you. — Bannon Whodis? The call is coming from inside! (@BannonRudis) October 21, 2019

3.

4.

5.

Notably the opponent was not even close — BadDude.SimoHayha😠 (@ChiefCovfefe) October 21, 2019

6.

Not inhuman. Badass? Yes. Incredible? Yes. But don’t even hint that this athlete isn’t human. That’s how the slippery slope begins. Do better. — Elitza (@elitzan) October 21, 2019

7.

She's definitely human, but she's AMAZING!!!!

We love a hijab-wearing queen:) — Anna Gifty✨ (@itsafronomics) October 21, 2019

“I am very grateful for these achievement and also for the endless supports,” Rahayu told The Jakarta Post after the achievement.

We are proud of you Aries, you go girl!
description: An Indonesian climber, Aries Susanti Rahayu, broke all records and became the fastest to climb a wall and just guess her record time? She scaled the 15 metre wall in less than seven seconds - a record time of 6.995 seconds. The video of the incident is now going viral on social media which shows Aries wearing a red jersey and a hijab and climbing the wall.
